info.title: My Cookery Book 2 - backend
info.description: This is rest api application backend developed on NodeJS and ExpressJS. Writen in typescript.

tags.name: auth
tags.description: Endpoint for authentication and changing password.

200.description: List of units by unit category

password.description: Old password to verify this user

newPassword.description: New password for user. Should be at least 8 characters long, at least one small letter, one capital letter and one number.

password.description: New password for user. Should be at least 8 characters long, at least one small letter, one capital letter and one number.

UnauthorizedError.description: Access token is missing or invalid. Possibly incorrect credentials.

NotFound.description: Object is missing, or required parent doesn't exists.

InternalServerError.description: General error. Something went wrong on server side.

UnprocessableEntity.description: Request can't be processed because validation failed.

ServiceUnavailableError.description: Request can't be processed because mail service failed.
